title: In transcript of closed-door testimony, Jack Smith defends his prosecutions of Trump
description: The House Oversight Committee has released the transcript and video of a private deposition by former special counsel Jack Smith in December.
content: The House Oversight Committee has released the transcript and video of a private deposition by former special counsel Jack Smith in December.
